How 100% Bonus Depreciation Supercharges U.S. Manufacturing
items.summary:
- The *One Big Beautiful Bill Act (OBBBA)* introduces **100% bonus depreciation**, allowing manufacturers to fully expense new machinery, enhancing cash flow and investment potential.
- This provision significantly reduces the effective after-tax cost of assets and accelerates ROI, making automation more accessible for small to mid-sized manufacturers.
- The initiative aims to revitalize U.S. manufacturing and potentially boost GDP, signaling strong governmental support for domestic production.

items.title: Supercharging U.S. Manufacturing: OBBBA Insights
items.summary:

items.title: AI Knowledge Acceleration in Manufacturing
items.summary:

items.title: The Truth About the Israel-Iran Conflict and Its Impact on Global Manufacturing
items.summary:
